Lab & web

Hi, I'm vincent !

Born at Annecy and raised south on the France. I've make my degrees math and computer science the University of Grenoble.

I love learning, see a good movie, making piano, fly in paragliding and sometime tinker a friendly web application.

I enjoy developing a create great application, and am passionate about technology watch in the web. How making a more stable application ? How make a better more simply ? I test lot off new technology for have best vision.

A other point, I'm interesting about the role technology who can spread knowledge which contribute to social change.

The best way to reach me is by email vincentherl@live.fr
